texts.copyright: Rights management in France is owned by Bandai. If any media available on this website could harm the rights holders, we undertake to remove it at their request.

texts.media: Images that are displayed on this site are copyrighted to Sunrise or Bandai, or to the creator of the image and are used on this website as defined by the French fair use (droit de citation).

texts.website: {{ appName }} is an independent website and is in no way supported, endorsed or affiliated with Sunrise or Bandai. The aim of {{ appName }} is to inform and share our passion towards Gundam. This site is not for profit or commercial purposes.

cookies.expiration: Cookies last one year. They are saved on the user's device when he/she chooses a language or a theme and if he/she accepts cookies.
cookies.language: a cookie that saves the language used by the user so that he/she can be redirected from the default page to the good language (preference cookie); if it is not present, he/she is redirected with the language detected from his/her browser
cookies.list: {{ appName }} uses two kinds of cookies:
cookies.noCookies: {{ appName }} can work without any cookie. Cookies can be deleted from the cookie management page.
cookies.theme: a cookie that saves the theme used (preference cookie); if it is not present, the site uses the operating system theme from the user's device

texts.dataSharing: {{ appName }} does not collect or process any user-related information outside of user's theme and language, as described above.

texts.exhaustiveness: {{ appName }} does not want to cover all Gundam universes or medias. Other Gundam sites do it very well.
texts.free: {{ appName }} is not for profit or commercial purposes, you can access it for free.
texts.share: {{ appName }}'s purpose is to let people discover and improve their knowledge about Gundam and to make the community bigger.

language.text: This cookie is used to save the language you use so that you can be redirected to the good language when you first arrive on the website default page. On other pages, the language in the address of the visited page is used. If this cookie is not present, your browser language is detected and used.
language.title: Language cookie

list.language: a cookie to save the language you want to use
list.theme: a cookie to save the theme you want to use

cookies.noCookie: You do not use such a cookie on your device.
cookies.text: You can delete all the cookies saved on your device here:

theme.text: This cookie is used to save the theme you use. If this cookie is not present, your operating system theme is used instead.
theme.title: Theme cookie

cookies.title: Cookie management

cookies.more: Cookies are optional. You can manage them at any time.
cookies.question: Do you want to save your préference with a cookie?

home.subtitle: This site speaks about Mobile Suit Gundam (機動戦士ガンダム), a series by Yoshiyuki Tomino (富野 由悠季 or 富野 喜幸).
home.title: Welcome to Easy Gundam!
